description.p: This buckler is heavier than it first appears. Those who find themselves in the possession of this magical item find that the world accomodates their path through it.
Dormant. The Weight of the World grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

ul.li: This buckler can turn into a Light Hammer, Warhammer, or a Maul. You are considered proficient with these weapons if you are attuned to The Weight of the World
The weapon deals weapon damage as if it were large: 2d4 for the Light Hammer, 2d10 for the Warhammer, and 4d6 for the Maul.

description.p: This spear was crafted in a land far from here, having fallen through the Omniverse to end up in these lands.
Dormant. The Weight of the World grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

ul.li: This buckler can turn into a Light Hammer, Warhammer, or a Maul. You are considered proficient with these weapons if you are attuned to The Weight of the World
The weapon deals weapon damage as if it were large: 2d4 for the Light Hammer, 2d10 for the Warhammer, and 4d6 for the Maul.

description.p: Awakened. When the Weight of the World reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

ul.li: The summoned weapon's damage dice are now triple the normal amount.
The weilder can now cast Earthbind 1/day from the Weight of the World.

description.p: Awakened. When the Weight of the World reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:

ul.li: The summoned weapon's damage dice are now triple the normal amount, as if Huge. Light Hammer: 3d4, Warhammer: 3d10, Maul: 6d6.
The wielder can now cast Earthbind 1 per day from the Weight of the World.

description.p: Exalted. When the Weight of the World reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:

ul.li: The summoned weapon's damage dice is now quadrupled, as if the weapon is Gargantuan. Light Hammer: 4d4, Warhammer: 4d10, Maul: 8d6.
The wielder can now cast Stone Shape and Earthquake from the Weight of the World 1 per day.
The wielder can cast Earthbind 3 times per day.
